attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dorris Roberts 'tranmere fan' is a closet red and should be banned from travelling on selwyns coaches.
She thinks she can do anything she likes and is very annoying.
I think if we can get enough signatures to take to the club, Dorris will be banned from future travel.

Thanks

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
